metadata.title: Secure RootDN password
metadata.description: If installed, LDAP server should be configured to protect the RootDN password.

criteria.comment: If installed, LDAP server should be configured to use a non-default domain

extend_definition.comment: openldap server should only be present if it fulfills an operational requirement

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Tests the value of the ^[\s]*olcRootPW[\s]*:[\s]*\S*\{SSHA\}\S* expression in the /etc/openldap/slapd.d/cn=config/olcDatabase*bdb.ldif file
